subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Clint Mathis had a goal and an assist in his return to the New York area, leading the Red Bulls to a victory over F.C. Dallas on Sunday in a heavy, wind-swept rain.
snippet: Clint Mathis had a goal and an assist in his return to the New York area, leading the Red Bulls to a victory over F.C. Dallas on Sunday in a heavy, wind-swept rain.
